name: Samurai Gunn 2
description:
Adventure with a friend through a medieval metropolis on the brink of
crisis—fight or fly past your foes to discover the mystery behind Gunn
City's ghostly threat. …or battle together with a group of 2-4 friends
in versus with improved controls, new levels, and new characters! A
princess, a golem, a samurai knight, and a homeless girl all have a part
in rewriting the fate of Gunn City forever.

Key Features:

Samurai Gunn 2 launches first on Switch in Q1 with a window of
exclusivity.

Designed by Beau Blyth, co-creator of Hyper Light Drifter.

Armed with a sword, a gunn, and three bullets per life, fight or fly
past your foes to discover the mystery behind Gunn City's ghostly
threat. Every decision matters, since one hit is all that separates
victory from defeat.

Classic versus mode is back for 2-4 players with improved controls,
new levels, and new characters.

New to Samurai Gunn 2, adventure with a friend through a
medieval metropolis on the brink of crisis. A mad emperor pushes to
expand the city at a ridiculous pace, while an epidemic of gunnpowder
overdoses is on the rise, and old spirits are creeping back into the
world.

Featuring Trigger Soul, a Samurai Gunn graphic novel by
acclaimed French comic creator Valentin Seiche. With super smooth
touch screen interface (exclusive to Switch).
